game.name: ArvusForge
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Craft your own weapons and carve your path in this fast-paced 3D roguelike action game. Defeat enemies, collect materials, and build powerful gear as you progress through a node-based world. Every run is a new challenge with randomized skills and endless crafting possibilities.
